Entries.5295004/e 5295002/t 1730 2000/w sunny: nightTime/-1000 -1000/MisterGinger 33 18 2 Shane 34 25 2 farmer -100 -100 1/addConversationTopic ShaneTrissRH1 5/skippable/addLantern 735 35 24 1/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/viewport 34 25 true/move MisterGinger 0 7 1/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Hello Shane."/stopAnimation Shane/pause 500/jump Shane 5/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 1000/emote Shane 12/pause 500/speak Shane "What are you doing here?$3#$b#Come to judge me too?$5"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 500/speak Shane "It's only one can. Or maybe two...or three... anyway...$2#$b#It's none of your business.$5"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Shane... I'm worried about you.$2#$b#May I join you for a while?"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 500/emote Shane 40/pause 2000/speak Shane "Yeah... whatever... Like I could ever stop you doing anything you wanted.$5"/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Thanks."/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 1 2/animate MisterGinger false true 480 16 17/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 500/emote Shane 16/pause 500/speak Shane "Are you... knitting?$3"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Yep. I've found it helps to keep my hands busy. Helps to keep the demons at bay."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 500/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 2000/stopAnimation Shane/faceDirection Shane 3/emote Shane 40/pause 2000/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "You're not going to nag me about drinking again?$2"/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Nope."/pause 2000/faceDirection Shane 3/textAboveHead Shane "Why not?"/pause 500/stopAnimation MisterGinger/move MisterGinger 0 -1 2/speak MisterGinger "Figured it's my fault. No sooner have you finally started to get your life back together then Jas's father returns from beyond the grave.#$b#... And not only is he devilishly handsome, but he's suddenly a major part of her life...$3#$b#...and yours.$2"/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/pause 500/speak Shane "'Devilishly handsome'?$1"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "You better believe it. Ladies dig redheads.$1"/pause 500/speak Shane "Just as up yourself as I remember."/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Oh, I seem to recall you had your share of the admirers too, Shane."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 500/speak Shane "Those days are long gone. "/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Oh, I dunno... you might be surprised.#$b#Pretty sure @ has their eyes on you."/pause 500/speak Shane "@? Nah. We're just friends. Good friends. They threw me a rope when the abyss all but swallowed me.$4"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "I'm sorry I didn't do more. Try harder. Spill more beer.#$b#But I'm back now, Shane."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "I know things got weird between us... and we'll never be the same as we were...#$b#But... I'm here for you, okay?$2"/pause 500/emote Shane 32/pause 1500/speak MisterGinger "Now, do you want some help finishing off that six-pack?$6"/pause 500/speak Shane "You can have it, if you like. Not really in the mood for it anymore."/pause 500/move Shane 1 0 3/pause 500/addObject 34 25 167 1/jump MisterGinger 5/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Joja cola?!"/pause 500/speak Shane "Yeah, I won a year's supply in some dumb competition.#$b#What? You thought I was back on the booze?$5"/move Shane -1 0 3/pause 500/speak Shane "Just proof nobody trusts me to pull my life together.$5"/pause 500/emote Shane 12/faceDirection Shane 0/move Shane 0 -10 0 true/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Shane... wait..."/pause 1000/speak MisterGinger "I didn't doubt you... you meathead.$2"/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 500/end warpOut
Entries.5295013/e 5295004/A ShaneTrissRH1/w sunn: nightTime/-1000 -1000/MisterGinger -100 -100 3 Shane 34 25 2 Harvey -100 -100 3 Marnie -100 -100 1 Jas -100 -100 1 farmer -100 -100 1/addConversationTopic ShaneTrissRH2 3/skippable/addLantern 735 35 24 1/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/viewport 31 21 true/pause 1000/playSound swordswipe/pause 1000/playSound stoneCrack/pause 1000/playSound rabbit/pause 500/stopAnimation Shane/faceDirection Shane 0/textAboveHead Shane "Who's there?"/pause 500/warp MisterGinger 20 12/move MisterGinger 4 0 1/move MisterGinger 0 1 2/move MisterGinger 3 0 1/textAboveHead Shane "Tristan?"/move MisterGinger 0 -1 1/move MisterGinger 3 0 2/move MisterGinger 0 3 1/move MisterGinger 4 0 2/emote MisterGinger 40/pause 1000/shake MisterGinger 3000/pause 500/pause 500/jump Shane 5/speed Shane 5/move Shane 0 -7 0/speak Shane "Tristan? Are you okay?$2"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "I'm... I'm fine... jusht fine...$10"/pause 500/emote Shane 12/pause 500/speak Shane "Are you... drunk?$a"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "No... I don't... I don't think so...$10"/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 0/speak MisterGinger "Who? ... Sh-Shane?$10#$b#My... my head hurts... Wha-what's going on?$10"/shake MisterGinger 500/showFrame MisterGinger 20/pause 500/move Shane 0 -1 0/fade/stopMusic/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation AnimalShop/viewport -1000 -1000/warp MisterGinger 27 4/warp Shane 25 4/warp Jas 1 7/warp Marnie 24 15/warp Harvey 25 15/showFrame MisterGinger 0/faceDirection Shane 1/viewport 22 9 true/pause 500/emote Shane 28/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Shane?"/pause 500/jump Shane 3/pause 500/speak Shane "You're awake! Thank Yoba.$3"/playMusic shaneTheme/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Wha... what happened?$10"/speak Shane "The doc says you hit your head. You have a concussion.$2#$b#What were you doing?$3"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "I... fuh-fighting monsters... It's... Itsh my job.$10#$b#Keep-keeping the town safe... for... for Jas...$10#$b#I sh-should get back out there...$10"/move MisterGinger -1 0 3/pause 500/speak Shane "You're to rest. Doctor's orders.$2#$b#Though it surprises me how a blow could get through that thick skull of yours.$3"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Hah! Well, I wasn't intending to get into your bed so easily.$11"/pause 500/emote Shane 40/pause 1500/emote MisterGinger 60/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 500/speak Shane "Doc says you're allowed to sleep. Just try not to die, okay?$2#$b#Jas'd never forgive me.$4"/speak MisterGinger "Promise. But if you're gonna to be my nurse, you need to work on your bedside manner.$10#$b#And maybe get a cute little outfit?$11"/emote Shane 12/pause 500/speak Shane "You're delirious. I'm gonna sleep on the couch.$2"/pause 500/move Shane 0 3 3/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Shane?"/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 0/pause 1500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Thank you."/pause 500/emote Shane 32/pause 500/speak Shane "Goodnight Tristan."/pause 1000/end warpOut
Entries.5295014/e 5295013/A ShaneTrissRH2/w sunn: none/90 24/Shane 90 17 2 farmer 96 23 3/skippable/pause 500/move Shane 0 5 2 true/move farmer -5 0 3 true/pause 1500/textAboveHead Shane "Hey there"/pause 1500/speak Shane "@? I'd like to talk to you about something... it's personal, and awkward.$2"/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2/question fork1 "...#Sure, what's up?#No, sort your own issues out."/fork NoHelpShaneTriss/pause 500/speak Shane "Not here though. Come on."/faceDirection Shane 3/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Shane 34 25/warp farmer 33 25/faceDirection farmer 1/positionOffset farmer 0 20/viewport 34 25 true/pause 1000/playMusic shaneTheme/speak Shane "Remember this spot? Yeh, I do a lot of thinking here. About the past. The future...#$b#...And recently I've been thinking a lot about Tristan."/emote farmer 8/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 500/speak Shane "We were buds back in college. Really good buds, practically inseparable. Sometimes I'd imagine we were more than...#$b#...nevermind that.$2#$b#Then he met Mona, and swept her off her feet with his irrepressible charm.#$b#I hated him for that: for stealing my sister, abandoning me, then ditching us both.#$b#Yeh, I know everyone said he was dead, but I didn't believe that. Didn't want to believe that.#$b#Cos if he was dead... well...$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 500/emote Shane 40/pause 1500/speak Shane "And now he's back. And I tried to hate him... But I don't. I can't.#$b#$q 529515 null#What should I do?#$r 529516 50 ShaneTrissL#Tell him how you feel. I bet he feels the same way.#$r 529517 100 ShaneTrissN#It's better to move on, Shane. Date someone else (maybe me).#$r 529517 -100 ShaneTrissG#Yuck! He dated your sister. Are you crazy??!"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 1/emote Shane 40/pause 500/speak Shane "Well, thanks for listening, @. See ya round, okay?"/pause 500/end warpOut
Entries.NoHelpShaneTriss: pause 500/emote Shane 12/speak Shane "Sorry to bother you.$5#$b#I mean, I only valued your opinion, but whatever...$2"/pause 500/move Shane 0 2 1/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Shane "See you around, @."/move Shane 7 0 1 true/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/end

Entries.5295015/e 5295013/t 900 1300/q 529516/p: none/14 18/farmer 10 24 0 MisterGinger 7 18 2 Shane -100 -100 0/addConversationTopic TrissShaneDate 7/skippable/animate MisterGinger false true 480 16 17/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Welcome"/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak MisterGinger "It's good to see you, @."/move farmer -5 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/stopAnimation MisterGinger 0/move MisterGinger 0 1 2/speak MisterGinger "Jas and me have been playing checkers. She's a smart lass. Got that from her Mom, obviously.$4"/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Fancy a game?"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/playSound stairsdown/pause 500/jump MisterGinger 5/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Another visitor! My, aren't I the popular one today.$1#$b#It's probably Marnie dropping by with more food.#$b#She spoils me.$4"/speed MisterGinger 4/move MisterGinger 3 0 2/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Come in!"/pause 1000/playSound doorOpen/pause 500/warp Shane 10 24 0/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Shane!"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Welcome to my humble abode. A bit of a step up from a jacket on the floor, don't you think?$3"/pause 500/move Shane 0 -3 0/pause 500/emote Shane 28/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 3/emote farmer 32/emote Shane 60/speak Shane "Um, sorry. Didn't mean to intrude. Didn't know you had guests already. I'll... I'll come back later.$2"/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 500/speed Shane 4/move Shane 0 3 2 true/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Shane... wait!"/pause 1000/warp Shane -100 -100/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 1 3/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 28/quickQuestion #What are you waiting for? Go after him!#Well... that was weird. Now, how about that game?#don't worry about him... I'm sure it's nothing important.(break)pause 500\jump MisterGinger 5\speak MisterGinger "Of course!$3"(break)pause 500\emote MisterGinger 40\pause 1000\speak MisterGinger "I'd better go. It could be important!$2"(break)pause 500\emote MisterGinger 12\pause 1000\speak MisterGinger "I'd better find out.$5"/pause 500/speed MisterGinger 5/move MisterGinger 0 4 2/warp MisterGinger -100 -100/pause 500/question fork0 "...?#Follow him.#Wait."/fork FollowTriss/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 2 0 0/pause 500/message "There's some sort of cheesy soap opera on."/pause 500/fade/pause 100/viewport -1000 -1000/message "It's oddly compelling."/pause 500/playSound thudStep/warp MisterGinger 9 19/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/speak MisterGinger "@?#$b#@!"/pause 500/viewport 14 18/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "You're still here?! Well, guess what?"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Shane's invited me to a gridball game! Next week!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Which, as far as I can tell, is a bunch of heavily padded grown men chasing a funny shaped ball around a field...$3#$b#Can't say I understand any of it, but hey, there'll be hotdogs and, most importantly, Shane!$1#$b#I think we're friends again, @!#$b#And maybe... maybe something more?"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 60/pause 1500/end warpOut
Entries.FollowTriss: pause 500/speed farmer 3/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 4 0 1/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_EastScarpe/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Shane 32 100/warp MisterGinger 32 88/warp farmer 24 97/faceDirection farmer 2/viewport 30 101 true/emote Shane 28/move MisterGinger 0 10 2 true/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "Chicken..."/pause 2000/speak MisterGinger "Chickens are pretty fierce, actually. As you damned well know.$3"/jump Shane 5/faceDirection Shane 0/pause 500/emote Shane 28/pause 2000/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "You weren't supposed to follow me.$2"/pause 500/move MisterGinger -1 0 2/move MisterGinger 0 2 2/pause 500/positionOffset MisterGinger 0 20/speak MisterGinger "I thought you knew, Shane. I do a lot of things I'm not supposed to."/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/faceDirection Shane 3/jump Shane 3/move Shane 1 0 3/pause 500/emote Shane 28/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "So what were you coming to ask me?#$b#You were coming to ask me something, weren't you?"/pause 500/emote Shane 40/pause 1500/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/textAboveHead Shane "*gulp*"/pause 1500/speak Shane "I've got tickets for a gridball game next week. Zuzu City Tunnelers versus the Grampleton Tigers."/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 40/pause 500/emote Shane 28/speak Shane "Do you want to join me?"/pause 1000/speak MisterGinger "Gridball, right? That's when grown men chase a funny-shaped ball around a field, and occasionally jump on one another?"/emote Shane 12/speak Shane "That's one way to describe it. I guess.$2"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Sounds fun. I'm in! It's a date.$1"/pause 500/emote Shane 60/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end

Entries.5295016/e 5295015/t 1700 2000/A TrissSha: continue/-1000 -1000/MisterGinger 12 19 0 Shane 13 10 2 Alex 15 21 3 Pam 10 10 2 farmer 14 23 0/skippable/changePortrait MisterGinger date/changeSprite MisterGinger date/viewport 12 11 clamp true/move MisterGinger 0 -6 0/move Alex 0 -4 0/speak Shane "Oh. You made it."/speak MisterGinger "Oh, don't sound too excited. I could be curled up in front of the fire right now.#$b#Instead, I've chosen to watch a bunch of men chase each other around a field and fight over a ball."/emote Alex 8/speak Shane "You don't have to come you know, if it's too much trouble.$2"/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 28/speak MisterGinger "I want to, Shane, you know I do! Gridball might not be my thing...#$b#But I do want to spend time with you.$1"/emote Shane 60/pause 1000/speak Shane "You look ridiculous, by the way. It's a Gridball game, not a dinner party!$1"/speak MisterGinger "Oh, you silver-tongued flatterer you.$6#$b#But seriously, what do you think?$2"/pause 500/emote Shane 40/pause 1500/TextAboveHead Shane "(Ilikeit.)"/pause 1500/speak MisterGinger "I'm glad. Now, let's go before Pam starts asking questions."/pause 500/emote Pam 12/faceDirection Shane 3/move MisterGinger 0 -2 0 true/move Alex 0 -2 0 true/pause 1000/move MisterGinger 0 -1 0/playSound thudStep/warp MisterGinger -100 -100/move Shane -1 0 0/move Shane 0 -1 0/playSound thudStep/warp Shane -100 -100/move farmer 0 -8 0/faceDirection Alex 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Alex "So, Shane and Tristan? What's going on there?$2"/pause 500/quickQuestion #Pretty sure they're dating.#No idea.#It's none of your business.#Who cares?(break)speak Alex "Ah. Cool.$1"(break)speak Alex "Really? I thought you were pretty close with that lot?"(break)speak Alex "Wow. Maybe not. But no need to be nasty about it.$5"(break)speak Alex "Just curious, that's all. Nothing much interesting goes on around here."/pause 500/question fork0 "Hey, are you coming to the game too?#No way. Gridball's for losers.#Of course I am!"/fork Tristan_NoGame/pause 500/textAboveHead Alex "Cool"/move Alex 0 -5 0 true/move farmer 0 -5 0 true/pause 3000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/pause 800/playSound busDriveOff/pause 4000/changeToTemporaryMap Stadium false/pause 1000/playMusic Stadium_ambient/warp farmer 13 12/warp Alex 14 12/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Alex 2/warp MisterGinger 19 16/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/positionOffset MisterGinger 0 12/warp Shane 22 9/advancedMove Shane false 0 7 -2 0/viewport 22 18 clamp true/proceedPosition Shane/positionOffset Shane 0 12/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "Hey, I got you a cold one."/showFrame Shane 25/pause 1000/playSound coin/showFrame Shane 0/emote MisterGinger 8/speak Shane "Yeah, it's ginger beer. If I remember rightly, you loved that stuff.$1"/emote MisterGinger 32/speak Shane "And I got myself a Joja cola, don't worry."/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 1000/speak MisterGinger "I'm not worried, Shane. You've turned your life back around.$1"/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/stopAnimation Shane/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 1000/speak MisterGinger "I'm proud of you.#$b#I realize now, finally, that Mona chose the right man to raise our daughter.$4"/emote Shane 60/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Oh, it took a bit of convincing, I have to say."/pause 500/speak Shane "Yeah, I almost messed that up royally. I'm just lucky I've got Marnie, Jas, @. And now you. I guess?"/speak MisterGinger "Yeah Shane... you've got me."/positionOffset MisterGinger 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset MisterGinger 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset MisterGinger 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset MisterGinger 2 0/showFrame MisterGinger 28/pause 1000/showFrame Shane 34/pause 1000/playSound Stadium_cheer/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 2/jump Shane 5/showFrame MisterGinger 4/speak Shane "Gahh!! Look, the Tunnelers are on the attack!$10"/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/emote MisterGinger 12/pause 1000/playSound Stadium_cheer/pause 1000/textAboveHead Shane "Goal!!"/jump Alex/pause 100/textAboveHead Alex "Goal!"/pause 2500/end dialogue MisterGinger "Did I enjoy the gridball game? Well...I can't say I understand the sport at all....#$b#But yeah, I had a good time.$1"

Entries.winter_Fri10: I'm glad Shane and Tristan found each other. He seems so much happier nowadays.#$b#Sometimes, when they were in college, I wondered, you know?$3

Entries.TristanHouse_ST1: I can't believe Tristan actually learned to cook. This pizza's actually halfway decent: spicy AND cheesy. Just the way I like it.$1
Entries.TristanHouse_ST2: Hmmm, these pepper poppers taste like the ones Marnie makes. Coincidence? Not likely! Delicious? Definitely!#1
Entries.TristanHouse_ST3: Pepper Popper Pizza?!... this is gonna haunt my dreams, you know.$2
Entries.TristanHouse_ST4: Welp, if this is what it takes to get to watch the game...$1
Entries.TristanHouse_ST5: Yeh, I figured I'd let him win. Chess isn't really my game, you know.
Entries.TristanHouse_ST6: No, don't talk. I'm gonna wipe that smug, condescending smile off his face.$2

Entries.TristanHouse_ST1: Hey pizza's easy. A spread of chili sauce, a large handful of cheese. Yeah, Marnie made the bases.$1
Entries.TristanHouse_ST2: What can I say? Shane sure does love things spicy. I can barely feel my tongue!$2
Entries.TristanHouse_ST3: Oh Shane's easy to cook for: he likes things hot, and cheesy. I guess that's why he likes me.$6
Entries.TristanHouse_ST4: Yeh, we're watching a gridball game and playing chess. This is the life, right?
Entries.TristanHouse_ST5: Hah, my knight jumps your queen, if you know what I mean.$6
Entries.TristanHouse_ST6: Aww, doesn't Shane get the cutest furrow in his brow when he's concentrating?$3

Entries.MisterGinger: I asked Shane if we should dance. But apparently he's got to dance with Emily. Tradition or some-such nonsense.#$b#Ah well, his loss. I'd have looked rather fetching in the dress, don't you think?$1
